message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit high for me.  Would you consider $90?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can see you're willing to pay $90, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate you working with me Alice, but $115 is still a bit too high for my budget.  How about we meet in the middle at $100?
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $100, Bob. I think we can find a sweet spot in between. How about $110? It's a bit higher than your last offer, but still a good compromise.
Alice, I'm feeling like we're getting close.  I could go up to $103 if you can make that work.

I like the direction we're heading, Bob! However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $103. How about we try $108? It's a bit higher, but I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
This is getting tough Alice!  I can edge up to $105, but that's really pushing my limit.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $112. It's a bit higher than your last offer, but I think it's a fair price for this unique product. What do you think?
